subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Buzzie Bavasi’s mischievous face should be on a bronze plaque in Cooperstown. But to his dying day, which was Thursday at age 93, he never complained about it.
snippet: Buzzie Bavasi’s mischievous face should be on a bronze plaque in Cooperstown. But to his dying day, which was Thursday at age 93, he never complained about it.
